text: Yesli zhenshchina opasayetsya, chto muzh budet durno obrashchat'sya s ney ili izbegat' yeye, to ne budet na nikh grekha, yesli oni poladyat mirom, ibo mirnoye resheniye -luchshe. Khotya lyudi [po prirode] i skupy, no yesli vy budete tvorit' dobro i budete bogoboyaznennymi, to, voistinu, Allakh vedayet o tom, chto vy vershite
